tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: INSPIRATIONAL  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  GET READY TO READ
comments: Great teacher. Great courses. Learned a lot. Very very slow for marking assignments ... despite several emails sent. Highly recommend.

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Chill tutor and gives great insight. Has quite a bit of knowledge in his field of expertise and makes you expand upon your writing in a positive way. Really enjoyed his class.

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Finished the entire course before receiving any marks, even with multiple reminder emails. Started the course excited, but after not receiving feedback for over a month, I lost all enthusiasm.

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Slow marking but replied to emails okay. Feedback was detailed and was willing to talk you through your assignment ideas to help you clarify and get on the right track. The course is a little tricky, what exactly you are suppose to take out of it is not clear. But if you love film, you\'ll have fun.

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Took courses in classroom setting -- very active & energetic instructor. Marking turnaround about 2 weeks.

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Verrrry slow marking. Be prepared to wait 2-4 weeks for your assignment to come back. Other than that,he provided helpful suggestions and the course was very enjoyable.

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Sometimes slow to answer/mark, but very helpful. Interesting class.
